title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2500.7 - Separability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2500.7 - Separability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Chapter or the application of
such provisions to any persons or circumstances shall be held invalid, the
validity of the remainder of this Chapter and the applicability of such
provisions to other persons or circumstances shall not be affected
thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2500.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
